template.name: qulinetitle
template.value:
<!--带有下划线的标题--> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:divider="@drawable/shap_divider" android:orientation="vertical" android:showDividers="end">
<include layout="@layout/layout_linear_title" /> </LinearLayout>
template.description: 趣拓专用-带有下划线的标题

template.name: qubtn
template.value:
<FrameLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@color/white" android:elevation="@dimen/dp_4">
<TextView android:id="@+id/btn_submit" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="@dimen/dp_8" android:layout_marginLeft="@dimen/dp_15" android:layout_marginRight="@dimen/dp_15" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/dp_8" android:background="@drawable/$background$" android:gravity="center" android:paddingBottom="@dimen/dp_15" android:paddingTop="@dimen/dp_15" android:text="$text$" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="@dimen/textsp17" android:textStyle="bold" android:visibility="gone" tools:visibility="visible" /> </FrameLayout>

template.name: qufoldtextview
template.value: <dashenxiang.mobile.com.dashenxiang.custom.FoldTextView android:id="@+id/ftv_desc" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginLeft="@dimen/dm_layout_margin_left" android:layout_marginRight="@dimen/dm_layout_margin_right" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/dp_15" android:textColor="@color/color_text" android:textSize="@dimen/textsp16" app:expandText="收起" app:foldText="更多" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/tv_name" app:showMaxLine="4" app:showTipAfterExpand="false" app:tipClickable="false" app:tipColor="@color/bule_o" app:tipGravity="0" tools:text="解决地方的反馈已二凯" />
template.description: 有显示更多的文字控件
